original_text: It will be bad for you on the day when God comes to judge people. You will not escape the punishment that he will bring from far away. There will be nobody to help you. There will be no safe place to hide your valuable things.
korean_text: 벌하시는 날과 멀리서 오는 환난 때에 너희가 어떻게 하려느냐 누구에게로 도망하여 도움을 구하겠으며 너희의 영화를 어느 곳에 두려느냐

sentences.original_text: It will be bad for you
on the day when God comes to judge people
You will not escape the punishment
that he will bring from far away
There will be nobody to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 도와줄 사람이 아무도 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: There will be no safe place
